text: Does anyone have good example notebooks with WGLMakie/Pluto integration? The intersection of their two different takes on observables is giving me a headache

elements.text: Does anyone have good example notebooks with WGLMakie/Pluto integration? The intersection of their two different takes on observables is giving me a headache

text: I employ the mental model, that one should use Pluto to build an interactive JSServe WGLMakie App :wink: I want to make a blog post / tutorial this weekend about exactly that

elements.text: I employ the mental model, that one should use Pluto to build an interactive JSServe WGLMakie App
I want to make a blog post / tutorial this weekend about exactly that

text: Awesome! I was also surprised by how long it took to push a new (1024 x 1024 Gray{Float32}) image to a scene with WGLMakie - over a second from when I triggered the observable. Is that because of some reliance on slow websocket serialization/deserialization?
